content: As an AI language model, I do not have access to the latest information. However, in general, government-funded apprenticeship programs, such as the U.S. Department of Labor's ApprenticeshipUSA program, are available to individuals who are at least 18 years old and have a high school diploma or equivalent. Other eligibility requirements may vary depending on the specific program and industry, and may include physical fitness, background check, and drug testing. It is always recommended to check with the specific apprenticeship program for their eligibility requirements and application process.
